content.detailedDescription: I was archery hunting on a farm in buchanan county agency, mo., i was on the most northern part of the farm looking over about 300 acres of land. it was about 50 mintues to sundown. approx a mile away i saw what i thought was a military cargo plane coming towards me from the south because it was very large and what looked like two headlights on the front and was a thin line like looking at a front of a plane that was fairly low to the ground. i was hutning so i kept looking for deer and there was a farming out harvesting corn with a combine. i looked back to the south because i expected to hear the plane go by when i looked back it was higher and above the corn silo at the top of the hill, there weren't any lights shining so i thought it had turned to go back south, again i looked to the field for more deer. i looked back up at the silo and the craft was still there and i thought how odd it is just sitting there and the one side shifted down towards the field in a 45 degree angle and just sat there. it now had my complete attention and i just watched it sit there for about 10 minutes then it came closer to me maybe 400 yards or so it appeared. it traveled west very slowly above the tree line. i was sitting there thinking what the hell is this thing. it was very large long ways but it was hard to tell the exact distance until it slowy started to move up maybe 50 feet and kinda of rolled to the south, thats when my jawed dropped, it turned flush to me with the bottom i would asume facing right at me. it was a huge arrowhead shaped aircraft trianle with about 9 or 10 perfectly distanced white lights on the bottom, they covered the bottom symetrically over the whole craft. it then leveled back off so i could see it as a thin line again and slowy worked its way south and then seemed to dissapear into the tree line which i would assume just travelled further south until it appeared to go behind the trees. not knowing the exact distance of the craft it is hard to judge size, but i would say it was atleast 100 yards long and 50 yards wide at the bottom of the triangle. the people who own the farm had mentioned to me a year before they saw a triangle thing in the sky early one night out coon hunting. i have hunted there for 20 years and never saw anything like that before. the farmer harvesting the field never saw a thing but he was not at my elavation so he may have had his view blocked by the tree line. this craft was far bigger than anything i had ever seen, made absolutely no noise that i could hear, and move with the percision of a car in the sky, it sat stationary for a good 10 minutes. i am sorry i did not have my camera with me that day but i assure you that this is not a wives tale this really did happen. i saw a similar craft on tv last year that was seen in the saint louis mo and illinois area, it was very similar to that it was seen by multiple witnesses there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Big triangle ufo while deer hunting

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dog a noticed a light just within the clouds that traveled in a circle with a diameter of approximately 300yrds.  the light itself was about the size of a kite. at first i thought it was someone pointing a light beam into the sky, much like those car dealerships do to get attention.  i began to seek out the source.  when i first noticed the light, it was to my left.   i followed it off the trail to the top of a hill where there were houses.  where i thought it might be coming from. as i traveled in the direction to see if i could find the source, i noticed the light moved away as if following just ahead of me.  i still didn't think much of it at this time.  i was just curious.  i saw i could not get under it.  so i turned around to return to the pathway i had left, a distance of about 150 feet. when i did, the light stopped retreating and reversed its cirling flight to go in the direction i was going.  i continued.  this seemed odd and i began to study it. the flight had a constant velocity and a constant radius.  it never appeared directly over me either.  it always stayed a little in front of me before it turned in its counter clockwise route.  there was no tail on this amorphous light to give me an indication of where the source was located.  the light looked self contained, self emitting.  the light did not continued downward from the sky to illuminate the ground either, ruling out a source about and in the center of the circle.  also it appear just inside the clouds and not on the surface facing me.  there were no sounds.  no wind either, just a quite night.  the cloud coverage was blanket like and low.  no stars could be seen.  the night was almost foggy.   this circling light contiuned to follow my progress along the winding pathway.   this went on for about 20-25 minutes.   it disappeared about the time the pathway i was walking cut behind a hill and trees.  it would have been hard to see me from above for a while until the pathway exited in the open after rounding the terrain.   and when i did exit the trail it was gone.
content.summary: Circling light

content.detailedDescription: It was our first night on the holland america  cruise ship leaving seattle towards alaska. the 3 oval shaped lights seemed to come from the east appearing over the ridge of the sound directly over my balcony. at first i thought they were 3 white birds coming directly at the ship. as they got closer (in a few seconds) they looked like someone let go of 3 white balloons from the other side of the ridge floating very fast (no sound) but they came over extremely fast and they were very bright. moving quickly, they passed over my head to the other side of the ship where i could no longer see them. as i saw them approaching i started to run into the room out of fear of the unknown, but my head was still turned looking towards the strange objects. then they were over the ship and gone.  i never reported it although i wanted to ask the captain or radar controller but never did.                         as far as the county of which it was in, i have no idea  but i could'nt send this without filling in the question.
content.summary: 3 oval  bright white balloonlike(size of party balloons) objects shaped in a triangle flew over cruise ship(over my balcony(facing east to land ridges )off my suite in the sound north of seatle.From east to west

content.detailedDescription:
Driving westbound on bastenchurry in yorba linda between fairmount and lakeview, i was looking straight ahead and noticed three lights in the sky at, what i assumed was close to, lax. (final approach to lax runs parallel to bastenchurry) i saw 3 lights close together, the first light was stationary, while the other 2 lights next to the first light were streaking straight down...Not horizontal like a meteor but straight down. i could not stop the car and watch. so when i got home i checked the news and called my brother-in-law, who is a sheriff, and asked him to check with his station. as of 6:55 he has yet to call me back. i don't think it was a ufo but i thought i just witnessed a mid air colisio't n between to aircraft. i haven't heard anything so maybe it was something else. 
but it looked very real.
content.summary: 2 lights falling to earth

content.detailedDescription:
This was so weird.  i was walking my dog.  it was late evening. there was a rumblingf sound coming from the sky.  it was snowing at the time.  there was no stars,just snow clouds.  it was like i heard the deep rumbling noise,but i didn't really pay attention to it.Untill,its like weird,i saw lights.  its so hard to explain what they looked like.  i know this sounds weird, but, there were just here and gone. period. very fast very ah....I don't know,neither here nor there.  
                             
t
content.summary: Rumble in the sky  large spheres.Here and gone

content.detailedDescription:
We were playing in the alley ,there were  7 spheres of light in the evening easwtern sky ,suddenly i  had to  look up and a silverybluish ufo about 35 -45 ft. in dia. with no lights or sound was a little higher than the telephone pole.We all ran frightened into a strang persons house. it was round with a smaller circle with a "y" shaped center. p.S i have anothert witness and will submit to a lie dector or any kind of test.I believe.Then i read in the bible of what eziekeil saw,the wheel in a wheel .
beryle color perfect description
content.summary: We were playing in the alley ,there were  7 spheres of light in the evening easwtern sky ,suddenly i  had to  look up and a silverybluish ufo about 35 -45 ft. in dia.

content.detailedDescription: I was out side reading then a little gust started and i looked up and saw a metal object just spinning the over the tree tops. i just thought it was a plane but then it it vanished out of thin air. it went back and forth then vanished i thought i went crazy but i talked to some neighbors and they told me they saw the same thing. was there one second then gone the next
content.summary: I was out side then i looked up and all of a sudden i saw a metalic like object in the sky then it disappered

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at stars through my telescope. then i was just at a star and saw somthing moving. i followed it with me telescope. it was moving south. it was star-like. but it was moving. it was moving pretty fast. then i lost it and tryed to find it. but i couldnt
content.summary: Star like.....Moving in the sky.  moving south

content.detailedDescription:
I am a truck driver and was traveling south on hwy 81, after turning east on hwy 46, i noticed something in front of me--maybe 200 ft off the ground traveling south bound very slowly, but very very large,there were no visable lights an ther was no noise that i could hear. it was foggy in layers and in and out of my veiw. it was metallic in color. it was so large i could not see how tall it was. i could veiw i think the bottom portion of the object. i could see the curve 0f the bottom only. as it travled south i could see it was extremely long, maybe the length of a football field. when i first saw it i was probably 1/2 to 3/4 mile from the object. by the time i reached it it had already crossed the hwy and my headlights were no longer able to light the object. i was very curious about it and tried to speed towards it as fast as i could. but could not get close enough fast enough to get a better view. almost looked like the bottom half of a 747 jet liner. after the object was out of sight was when reality hit me and i did get very frightened of what i saw. i proceeded east to the first truck stop which was outside of beresford, south dakota where i stopped and went inside. i inqired at the fuel desk if anyone had reported anything in the sky. the man looked at me as if i was crazy as i told him what i had seen. i was physically shaken.

this was 19 years ago and this is the first time i have reported this incident to anyone. 

i also have 3 photos of a ufo my sister found in an antique store that she stopped at in winner,south dakota. she inspected a dresser and an taped to the underside of one of the drawers was several pictures of a ufo. there were no dates on these pictures,but looked to be from the 50's or 60's. she gave me only 3 pictures, which i still have today.
content.summary: Travling east bound in southern south dakota on hwy 46 , it was alittle foggy ,  i witnessed a large oval shaped object traveling very slowly south bound , metallic an no lights an no noise

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i noticed these lights that kept blinking off and on and at great distances at times.There was sometimes one and at times the three like in the pic. they where anywhere from bartow all the way towards lake wales. this would last between 7:45pm and 10:00pm. i did get video but not close enough to reveal what they actually were. these started sometime in september and ended about the middle of november. this pic included has the three lights and the street light at the bottom left.
content.summary: These strange lights that kept going off and on and sometimes at different areas in a very large radius

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were vacationing in gatlinburg, tn and were renting out a cabin in the smokey mountain area. i decided to go out on the back deck and i looked up to admire the stars when all of a sudden, flying directly above our cabin, i saw a triangle shaped object. at first i thought it was a ufo, then maybe some secret military craft. the pointed side was facing the front. the two sides were longer than the back side. the two sides had rectangular orange lights on the perimeter. the back side was dark and had no lights.It was moving pretty fast, but not real fast. it was moving in a straight line-no weird movements. there were other airplanes in the sky as well, so i wonder if any pilots saw it. it was high - around where airplanes would fly. i called my fiance to come out and look, but he was stubborn and said it was airplane and wouldn't come out. i tried - but he wouldn't come out to see as he was already in bed. i think he was scared hee hee. it was a definite mechanical object - not an astroid, comet, star  or whatever else skeptic may try to say it was. afterwards, i felt frustrated that my fiance didn't come out to see it. but, later i was disappointed in my self for not pushing him to come out and see it more! thinking about it, i wonder why i didn't try to get him to come see it more. during the sighting, i was excited to see a ufo.  afterwards, confused if it was a ufo or some secret military craft.
content.summary: Triangular object with rectangular orange lights around perimeter on two sides, not back side

content.detailedDescription:
I was living south texas in a small town with a population of little more than 5,000 people.  i was principal of our county-wide middle-school and the superintendent of schools was my neighbor across the street.  an oilfield worker lived next door to him and the three of us would sometime sit out in our lawn chairs on the superintendent���s driveway chatting and enjoying the cool of the evening.  it was a moonless night with no streetlights and looking into the starry milky way was a beautiful sight. occasionally we���d spot a satellite inching across the night sky.

the superintendent���s garage was attached to the house by an opened covered walkway about 20 or so feet long. i was sitting facing south and had a good view of the sky under and over the walkway.  my neighbors were facing one north and one west.
the object arose out of the southern sky and arched toward the north.  it was shooting out  sparks all around and making a sizzling, rapidly ���shushing��� noise  it appeared to be round and spinning, but i couldn���t be sure of this or of its size and altitude.

it continued north as it approached the roof of the covered walkway, i looked straight up to see where it was going but it seemed to have disappeared.  as i gazed up i realized that there was a long black shape visible only because it was silhouetted against the bright starry sky. it was jet black and as i stared i became aware of one, then a second large round port very, very dimly lighted.  the sound was the most amazing part in that it was so low that i could only feel its vibration in my chest like the lowest notes of a pipe organ or far off thunder.  it was like an idling motor being revved slowly and again and again.
i don���t know how long it stayed there but it began to drift toward the west. the impression i got was that it just slid sideways until it dwindled to a dot and was gone..

the three of us just sat there silently. then i spoke up and said, ���what do you think that was?���  the superintendent replied noncommitedly, ���i don���t know.���   it was never mentioned again by any of us again.  we had our reputations to consider.  it was not a frightening experience.

if anyone has had a like experience, i���d like to discuss it with them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: On a warm summer evening i saw heard and felt an object in the night sky.  i was accompanied by friends.

content.detailedDescription: I have had multiple ufo sightings since i moved to my new home in 2003. they always occur after july 15th each year. after july 15th 2003, i was going to the bathroom at 3 a.M. and noticed darting white lights in the sky going very fast and was fasinated so i watched them.  as they came closer, the "lights" turned into a huge metallic blue "saucer" shaped craft with large rectangular windows. i was shocked, stunned and  fasinated all at the same time. the craft just sat above my home and my neighbor's home for 20 minutes.  i was sitting on the commode and thought to myself, "if i can make out the color, shape of windows, etc. so clearly of them i wonder if they can see me and i became scared for the first time and i hid behind the window shutter in my bathroom. from each window a huge white beam of light shone except for the end window which had either a red or blue beam from it.  i followed one beam from the craft's window with my eyes and it fell about 3 feet short of the grass near my lilac bush in my back yard.  the craft made absolutely no noise and hovered...Literally sat in the sky above my home and my neighbor's home for 20 minutes. then it flew off into the western sky and "sat"....If i had not seen it do what it just did, i would think i was looking at a star in the sky. i have never seen any craft go as fast as what this thing did.  after july 15th of 2004, i was going to the bathroom again in the middle of the night and happened to look out the window and i saw the rapidly moving darting lights and was stunned and said out loud, "they're back!!!" (they never came close enough to turn into a shape).   after july 15th in 2005, i saw the same saucer-shaped craft flying very low going west to east towards mountville... after july 15th in 2006 i saw a huge rectangle of light whizzing past my house going from west to east towards mountville.   my daughter (age 32) saw a small triangle ship hovering above the trees in back of our home in 2006. it was just after midnight on july 15th and she got scared and turned off her bedroom light because she was afraid they (someone, something) could see her. she was yelling for me to come to her bedroom but the object flew off at a very high speed.  just in may 2007 she got lost coming home from the philadelphia airport and was on back roads near reading, pa when she drove under a huge triangle ship with purple lights.  there were 2 other cars on the back roads with her. it was hovering and she and the other cars drove right under it. she said that she felt it was a surreal moment that she couldn't believe she was seeing what she was seeing.  i am a 57 year old mother of 3, nurse and grandmother. she is a nursing student with a firefighter's degree and is on the dean's list at her college.
content.summary: I saw darting white lights that when they came closer turned into a flying saucer shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: Serving as a mp on duty at aberdeen proving grds,my partner and i observed a orange ball of light in the sky on a moonless night at around 3am over chesapeak bay.It looked like the sun but seemed transparent at times.We had finished our security checks and went to park near the water on spesutie island.After sitting in our patrol car for a short time i saw the light of the object thru the windshild,above us.We both got out of the carand looked up at it.It was difficult to tell how far away it was but i would guess about 500yrds.After a few min the object moved swifty to our right,and then back in front/above us.It then shot srtait up.From the time i saw the object thru the windshild of our car to the time the ufo left i dont remember saying a word to my partner or he to me.It caught us both speachless.I also remember there was no clouds in the sky,a perfect clear night.After it left my partner and i talked about what we both saw.I called the mp station and told them what had happened.We were told to return to the station to fill out a report and statements.Phillips airfied was called to see if they had anything on radar during the time in question.Nothing was sighted on radar.The object gave you a strange feeling inside.Somehow i new i wasnt just looking at a light in sky but something intellegent.Back at the mp station we all kind of made light of it but i knew something just wasnt right with it.The more i thought about it the more it seemed like the orange vapor was conceiling something within itself.I dont know.This was a long time ago but i have always rememberd that night in aberdeen.I have often wondered if anyone else saw this.No one officially has  ever talked to me about this.
content.summary: Looked like a orange ball of light the size of the sun,almost transparent at times.Moonless night.

content.detailedDescription: See two postings below
content.summary: Brief ufo sighting in sky and ground below was in whiting, indiana spring of 1999

content.detailedDescription: I saw a silver tentecled object flying at high speed over my feild day area.I informed my friend of the object,which dissapered after. i spotted the ufo by casualy glaceing up. i first thought the object was hallutionasion;trick of the light. looking up again i learned it wasnt a hallutionasion it was a ufo. four or five tentecles trailed behind it. i was terified at the sight. sadly nobody belived my story. it hovered for a second and flew away.
content.summary: Silver tentecled

content.detailedDescription: Outside with my friend smoking a cigarette outside.  i was standing on the concrete and my friend was standing on the porch.  i decided to take two steps onto the porch.  i saw  spotlight flash, about 1.5 ft in diameter on the ground.  my first instinct was to look up to see where it was coming from and all i saw was a flash and a little smoke that was lit up in purple and yellowish green.  i looked at the ground again, the spotlight was gone.  i looked up again and just a tiny puff of smoke left.  i looked at the ground again the light was still gone.  i looked at the sky again and it was clear with a tiny trail of smoke, then in an instance the smoke trail was gone. but, my friend was looking up at the sky the same time i saw the spotlight.  she saw a ovalish type of craft, but didn't see the spotlight on the ground.  she couldn't believe what she saw and i couldn't believe what i saw and we both couldn't believe what we saw at the same time in 2 differnet spots.  i also got scared because i was standing in the exact same spot that the spotlight flashed at 2 seconds before i took two steps up on the porch.  we didn't know what to do.  we felt deeply compelled to report it, but we knew nobody would believe us.  the internet was not as big as the time, so really didn't have a way to research how to report.  we knew if we called the cops, they would think that we were crazy.  the sighting lasted no more than 2 seconds.  we hope that something would be on the news the next day, but nothing.  i am reporting this now, because i finally have an avenue to report it, eventhough so many years have passed.
content.summary: Brief ufo sighting in sky and ground

content.detailedDescription: Going to work  k-9   sky was vibrating--coming up cypress creek rd when very low fireball went right in front of me and went toward executive airport  --scared the crap out of me---i turned to old mcnabb rd  sky still vibrating another one goes by much higher-pefect comets but the sky was starting to quit shaking--i called executive airport to ask them if they seen it  --told me someone would call me later  never heard a word from them--i will never forget that day almost shaking writing this--willing to take lie detector or whatever--i seen it plain as day it was going very slow seen it for about 3 min
content.summary: Comet very low flying   200ft at most   then another   higher

content.detailedDescription: i was camping with my children when i was awoke by a low frequency humming noise. our campsite was about fifty feet into the woods in a small clearing. i went outside the tent, after not being able to get a good view of what it was from the windows of the tent, i went outside the tent. immediatly i knew that the noise was from above, about 30 feet above the trees. when i looked up through the trees i noticed that the stars were blacked out and that's when i started hearing what i can only describe as a camera's shutter sound. as i followed the noise i started getting deeper into the woods and decided that if i wanted a better view i would have to turn around and make my way out of the woods. i tried to move as fast as i could through the woods, checked on the children quickly, and ran to the edge of the woods. the shutter noise started fading and the object's humming soon could no longer be heard. i stood outside the woods for better than an hour and never seen or heard anything else. there were plenty of dogs barking and i could almost tell were the object was because of the barking in the distance. the woods prevented me from identifing anything else about the object. in closing; i have woked around aircraft for the military, 9yrs and know their limits. this was not anything that i have experienced or seen and i will never forget it as long as i live.
content.summary: Sounded like a camera's shutter every 8-10 seconds, with a low frequency, vibrating humming noise. the sky was clear but the stars were blacked out by what i perceived to be a 100 yd object.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a picture of this strange triangle on a website and was able to find it myself using google earth.  it does not appear to be a ground object or structure, therefore it must be in the sky.  i would call it an unidentified object, because since it is a still photo you can't tell if it is flying.  
the triangle object is in the area of cervantes, australia near the corner of bibby road and yeramullah road in the vicinity of badgingarra park in western australia.  the coordinates in google earth are: 
30 30 36 50 s by 115 22 52 00 e.  
hopefully someone locally could verify that this is not a ground object, and then we can proceed to find out what it actually is.
content.summary: Strange triangle with lights seen by google earth image.

content.detailedDescription:
The aforementioned object comes down from the night sky vertically and hovers approximately 5' of the gound, just on the side of a small hill. i climb the hill and make the following observations from 15' away:

1.  oval object with a secondary oval rise begining approximately 4' from outermost edge; and, rising for a total approximate height of 10';and, being 25-30' in width.                                     
2.  color grayish black / compare same to todays stealh fighter.
3.  appears metalic but the component manufacture is something else.
4.  the object has a low pitched repetive sound going in pitch from low to a higher audible *(similar to an air conditioner in volume and pitch)
5.  the base of the object has circular lights that upon entry and departure are bright white light(s)*the lights intensity is such that the same object appeared as one bright light from a distance. 
6.  objects bottom has round lights that are equally spaced and follow the oval completing a circle.
7.  the object when hovering changed its light configuration from white lights to multi colored lights.
8. when hovering each light pulsates off and on with a colored light in sequence with the pitch and/or whiring sound of the object *this is to say the audible pitch from low to high generates a pulsation with light.The colored lights also change their positions, where one was blue on the begining sequence the same light could next be red and so on.The lights on and off sequnce follows the oval of the object and takes approximately 5-6 seconds to complete the circle. 
9.  the multi color lights are for that time the most fantastic colors i have ever observed and today i know them as mauve colors and/or similar. 10. object changes light configuaration back to white lights and begins to rise vertically until reaching an approximate height of 400'. the object  then accelerates heading north at a spead that would be comparable to a falling star and disapears.

note: initial witnesses approx.100 people / remaining for the entirety of the event 2/ the first to exit - police/ media reports a large number of phone calls to local police / air force official report weather baloon
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Location mnt.Hood golf course; object observed as a light slowly coming to the ground vertically

content.detailedDescription:
this happened in oct-nov 2007 don't remember exact date.I am from india (chennai).I happen to notice 3 stars in an inverted triangle position on the west side everyday.As i am in the 1st floor and have a balcony i put on some music in my room and stand in the balcony every evening and noticed this stars formation to be peculiar.One day as i was looking at these 3 stars,the 1st star was not that bright,2nd was brighter than the 1st and the 3rd one the brightest of all.

  as  i was watching i suddenly noticed another star coming from the 1st star moving slowly to the 3rd star and when it came very closely to the 3rd star it became more brighter than the 3rd star and disappeared in about 5 seconds.I was shocked to see this and after about 2-3 minutes again one more star came from near the 1st star and to the 3rd star and disappeared in the same manner.Time was from 6:30pm-7pm.After this i haven't seen this inverted triangle stars formation,but have noticed strange objects flying in the sky,and i believe in ufo's as i had seen one when i was about 15 years old.

 have attached the drawing
content.summary: Star like object

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were fishing on hollover canal(masquitto lagoon) at about 4am i looked towards the sky and saw one star like light moving very quickly in a zig zag and clock wise motion within 3-5 minutes 4-8 more started to apear and more were apearing every minute spread across speraticly in straight lines and triangles formations some were mimiking each others movements these obcts were very high or small in size color of lights that were high in the sky were red and white at about 4:45 to5:15 my wife was looking south and i was looking north and at the same time exactly. 2 objects went through the sky that looked like comets almost ghostly (transparent/almost cloudy)very low no more than 1000ft heading east -west for a couple of minutes we thought we saw the same object then she told me she was looking south.We were shrimping so we had very bright lights in the water within 30 seconds of these things went over my lights surged and my battery running the lights got very low powererd my battery wasalmost completly drained.Until sun rise these things were all over the sky most of them moving slowly not in one any direction but short and very irradicke movements. at about 6:00 one object suddenly appeared right above the tree line south of our dirrection and hoverred in the general assembly building area moving side to side back &forth up and down it had three different colored lights that would glow white and red,red and green, but never white and green this object would hover and all of asudden it would dissappear and reappear within seconds.We looked up and saw 2-4 very bright lights moving north to south there was no real formation to the grouping at very high speeds very high altitude we watched the lower object for almost 1hour as the sun came up the object would slowly creaete disstance from were it was. we thought it was very strange that we did"nt see any airplanes in the sky for the entire time we watched after the last one dissappeared within 10 minutes air traffic started back.And alot of traffic started heading into nasa's property.Aircraft started flying and leaving alot of very low smoke. while the one hovered i shined my flash light at it blinking and it would change colors and distance away from us.I felt very nervous and currious when we saw these things esspecially when the one appeared very close to us ;i don;t hear anything from the object even the wildlife in the area went dead silence and then it slowly got higher in the sky stopping for a couple of minutes and then go a little higher and kept doing this until it vanished and one by one the others that were very hyigh would flash once and dissappear.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Flash,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: 20-30 seperate objects at various heights and distances 1 came very low and hovererd very irrattic movement and color changing

content.detailedDescription:
i was in the passenger seat of a car with two friends in march of 2004 on the way to another friends house at approximately 9 pm. we picked up our friend and began driving down the road. i noticed immediately a medium sized aircraft hovering above the road at the treeline up ahead. i thought it must have been a plane at first but as we approached i saw it was nothing i had ever seen. it was triangular shaped, kind of like a boomerang. at this time we slowed down to almost a complete stop. the aircraft was still infront of us barely moving in the air. i turned the radio off and rolled down my window. there was absolutely no sound coming from the aircraft. this is a quiet town where even the smallest sound would be heard. there was absolutely no sign the aircraft was even there if you did not happen to glance up. the ufo had white lights at the tips of the wings. its hard to remember the details about the white lights. on the middle underside of the aircraft was a red light. the color of the aircraft was black and it looked like there was a big shiny completely tinted black window at the front underside. 
for a good 15 seconds we stared at it, and they probably stared at us.I cannot explain the feelings i had at that time. the car slowly inched forward and the aircraft slowly moved in our direction. i was afraid to drive directly underneath the aircraft where the red light was, you never know in a situation like that, so i told my friend to take a direct right turn onto the next road. i could feel my heart beating like crazy. i turned around in my seat and kept my eye on the ufo, i did not take my eyes off it the entire time. as we began to drive i saw it shoot off at an angle in the blink of an eye. the speed and acceleration of it was incredible.There was no disturbance, sound, wind, nothing.The technology seemed so advanced. we watched it fly at an incredibly fast speed over the lake. this was an extremely intense and emotional event. i was shaking after the incident and was in a complete awe during the time that we saw it. there were two witnesses with me that saw the exact same thing. i dont know where this came from but i do think this was an incredible experience that makes you look at things in different ways. i only wish i had a digital camera or even a camera phone at the time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular aircraft hovered at treeline on the road  was seen while in a car at apprx. 9 pm. it was completely silent and had white and red lights.

content.detailedDescription: It was pretty much straight up 10pm cdt.  i was sitting on my couch, watching tv and just happened to look out the window to the west.  i noticed a bright white object in the sky just over the trees and the horizen.  i was expecting as it came closer to start blinking red lights or white to show that it was a plane or helicopter.  as it approached i never saw any blinking lights whatsover.  it was like no plane or object that i'd ever seen before.  i ran in to get my video camera, cause i knew that no one would believe me, and i wanted proof for myself to study later.  after i grabbed the camera i went out onto my deck for a better view and turned on the video recorder.  i was having trouble picking up the object on video.  but i could see it clearly with the naked eye as it was moving overhead from west to east.  it was moving at what seemed like about 3 to 4 times the speed of normal jet planes moving from west to east out of kci airport in kc.  the object faded or disappeared twice, the second time it disappeared was just before it passed by the west side of my house, when it reappeared it was a very bright white light, still no sound.  upon the closest view, from my vanage point, it appeared to be like one larger white glow to the front of the object, a smaller, line like light leading from the front light to another large white glowing light on the back side of the object.  the front white glow, was slightly larger on the front than that on the back of the object.  to me, for it to be moving that fast across the entire sky, it had to be close to the ground, but i never heard a sound from it, which i always hear the jets, helicopters, and sometimes military aircraft that fly overhead.  it seemed up in the sky quite a way, maybe a little bit lower than the jets normally fly in this area.  was much larger than a passenger jet or helicopter.  i couldn't make out a definate shape to the vehicle. just that the glow was larger in the front, light was spherical on front and back, and a white light in a line between the front and back lights.  i only captured about 6 or 7 seconds of video of the object.  i looked at it over and over but didn't get much from the video.  i was holding the camera in my hand, so it's shaky, but it does show a white glowing ball towards the front, and another smaller, glowing white ball to the back of the object.  it moved across the sky in a fluid motion like that of normal aircraft, but seemed to be going much faster.  it took the object approximately 2 minutes to move from just this side of the horizen in the west, to the horizen in the east and then out of site.  no sound at all, no flashing lights at all.  this is what really puzzled me the most.   for what it's worth, i said earlier that day the following, "ok, i want to finally see a ufo."  kind of strange, that i asked to see one earlier that day, and then it happened.  a couple of months ago i noticed, out this same window, what looked like a glowing ball, very large, maybe half the size of the full moon in the sky.  it was dark orange in color.  i noticed it out of the corner of my eye.  i looked directly at it, as i did it looked like a dark light or door or something came around from behind the light from right to left and closed off the orange glow and then i couldn't see it anymore.   it was there in my vision of sight for approx 2-3 seconds.  i immediately looked to the tv to see if it was a reflection, it was far from the reflecting light of the tv. no other lights were on in the house, except for the light coming from the tv.  we have a dvr, i replayed the show on the the dvr, to see if there were any objects that could have put off that reflection, even though it was far away from the reflection of the tv, and there was nothing that could have reflected anything close to orange or spherical or ball shaped.   no explantation for what either object was, so i guess they are unidentified.     my feelings during the sighting were pretty much that i was expecting something to happen that would prove that it is just a plane or helicopter, but it wasn't.  after the sighting, i was trying to come up with a logical explanation for what i had just seen.  all i can say is, i'd never seen anything like it before.  if it was a u.S. air force aircraft it was completely silent and extremely fast.  i keep replaying it in my mind.  but can come up with no explanation, either a ufo or some new air force aircraft with serious technology.  the object either just went far enough from site that i couldn't see the light from it anymore or it disappeared.
content.summary: White object, brighter towards front of object, moved west to east, very fast, no sound at all

content.detailedDescription: I was abducted, but i am back now, it was nice, but everyone here seems strangely the same.  they tried to scan my brain with their mmind ray, but i am immune, so they brought me back.  call me if you want to go with me next time.  1-812-614-4539, ask for charles.  ps:  bring lots of beer, because they ain't got none there.
content.summary: Bright star mother ship

content.detailedDescription: Well, you might not believe the events that just happened, and i don't know if i do either. i was on my way home from work, and i saw some disturbance in the water down at the river that moves through muncie indiana,  i stopped and got out of my vehicle, and just then the lights dimmed, and then the engine turned off.  the water got very noisy, and the sound of ice breaking, and a bright lighted disk shape appeared to slowly rise out of the ice.  the shape appeared to hover and seemed to get closer to me.  i ducked underneath the front of the car, and yelled 'leave me alone', in case it wanted to approach me.  i wasn't armed then, but i wish i was.  i'll bet some buckshot would have scared them off.  anyway, after a minute or so, i could see the lights getting dimmer, so i looked out and saw the shape hovering toward the tree line along the white river.  a low hum came from the disk as it sped up and flew off to the north-east skyline.  when i got home, i noticed i had a sunburn that appeared around the back of my neck, but my wife said it was there before, so i am not sure if it is related.
content.summary: Disc shape emerged from white river, muncie indiana

content.detailedDescription: Hello fellows seekers of truth. it is in the spirt of giving of the season that i have decided to share with you my "identified flying object" story. please notice that i say "identified. it is also in responce to northern ireland releasing of the secret files and the announcement of your own goverment uk scheduled release of 2008 . and frances releasing oh and cant forget the japan goverment parliment officail statement either ! and now stevenville's incident and a delayed goverment disinformation ! ( i cant take the lies anymore) before i start i want to say something to you first . you dont want to see a space craft !. it's just not worth the many lonely nights of siliently weeping and wondering to myself because the goverment wont confirm what i know to be true . it was back in 2001 mid summer 10:35pm . i was outside in my back yard. having a cigerette . the night sky was very beautiful and cloudless. a huge white oval bright shaped flying object, soundless with large lights surounding it's middle that did not blink or pulsate came into view from behind my neighbours maple tree (i should mention my house is bordering a large park with a school ) i also want to mention the differant colours red, blue, green and yellow (i think the colours are important for us understanding how this object flys) anyways .....It wafted very slowly and very level across to the middle of the field i was dumbfounded ! i concidered hopping the fence to run closer and stand underneath it but for reasons i still cant get a grip on i remained stationary (and calm). it took about 5 minutes to reach the middle of the field then just like someone hitting a light switch .It just just vanished i thought to myself this secret military craft is awesome .. while i was searching the skys for it .....It freaking reappeared ! (i'am crying again) over my neighbours house and continued to slowly move again in a northly direction (i estimate it flew to the soccer, baseball fields that are about 3-4 minute walk from me and then shot and i mean shot because it took off like a bullet to a spot in the sky that it is our true north . ......I lost sight of it within i mean under 1.5 seconds . i returned into the house in a state of disbelief and went upstairs and just stared out the window to where it shot off to and began thinking who do i call (police , airport, military, my local goverment representitive ?????).......I want to know what you would do ......But anyways heres what i did .....Because i'am just a mere mortal man i forced myself to believe it was just some army / airforce navy boy getting into trouble by taking out the latest invention out for a tour .So i cowarded into nonaction anyways 20 minutes later while i'am still staring out the window .......The military jets could be heard doing flyovers (twice or two planes) then the helicopters flew by.....It took me over 2 years to mention it publicaly and this is my first and only time to report this online.....Ladies and gentlemen this thing was in my estimation 200-300 feet wide by 100-125 feet in hieght and i dont believe any military craft like this is possible by even the best tech we have availabe here on earth ...I have now studied the history of ufo via my computer andi'am left weeping and wondering if this is god ?............One more thing it flew only 100 feet above the ground and at it's furthest point to me was only 150 feet away (identifiable) i did not see a strange light in the sky ......Ps if the goverment did finaly announce the existance of such things i can honestly say my emotional state would greatly improve . please feel free to show my story to your goverment .....Thank you and please have a happy new year........Ps 2 nights ago i got incontact with stanton friedman .And i'am taking his advice ... so be prepared for a ufo story comming soon out of thornhill ont (on the border with toronto canada) because it was to huge for me to be the only witness and now the us goverments denial was the straw that broke the camels back for me it's now time to talk out loud !
content.summary: Ovid

content.detailedDescription:
Driving down coles ferry pike towards lebanon. grand dtrs saw the disc 
with lights spinning in circular motion and hovering in an open area. it was cloudy out and difficult to judge its size. we pulled off and watched it about 3 minutes then it was gone.
content.summary: Disc with dome

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside in my neighbor's yard alone, when i looked up at the stars and began to gaze. a second star the star i was looking at began to moved notherly at the  distance was a high rate of speed (i could tell by the stars around it that it was covering at large distance ) almost like a meteorite. but, it kept a straght parallel course across the horizon. at this time i realized this was something different. i called everyone over to where i was ( about 50ft  away ), by the time they came to my position the object was glowing intermitantly. it finally began to glow so bright that it looked like it would explode but did not. it simply shot off in a completely different direction. as it did this, it seemed to be traveling away at an intense rate of speed. the very same occurance happened to me in martha's vinyard years before, which, to me is puzzling. years ago, i also had what, i guess is called sleep paralysis, for a short lenght of time after both incidents had occured. i could not move and it made me vey afraid to sleep for a long time. i was having nightmares frequently. they have since gone away but the fear that they will return haunts me. this may sound like another hypocondriac but it's the truth. there was another sighting back when i was younger on halloween at a haunted house in the town of coventry ( next door to my town, which also had a nike  ( missles )sight at the time. taht one was a light show of different lights flashing on a foggy night. about 50 to 75 people wathed that display with no noise at all right over everyone's head. my father and i were in shock. he is a military veteran and had no idea what it was. no one could make out any details of the object, so it remained a mystery. things seem to add up over the years. i, myself, think something is happening that we all should be aware of.
content.summary: Sudden star moving across night sky. after seconds, began glowing/pulsating. retreated with severe speed. (another similar sighting years before in marth's vinyard
